basic_info.description:
I'm Olli Paloviita, a software engineer from Finland.

I am interested in new web technologies, security, cloud computing and algorithms. I like to bring new ideas forward and I enjoy learning new skills. I am a team player who wants to help and learn from others.

projects.title: botafar
projects.description: Add global remote controls and a real time livestream to your projects

projects.title: classified.html
projects.description: Portable offline encryption solution that stores everything into a single .html file, which can be accessed from terminal and browser. No dependencies, fully written in Vanilla JavaScript.

projects.title: sshkeyboard
projects.description: The only Python keyboard event callback library that works everywhere, even when used through an SSH connection (hence the name). Documentation build process and running tests/formatters is 100% automated

projects.title: Firebase Auth
projects.description: My custom authentication solution to build and deploy mobile friendly websites with authentication and realtime database connection quickly. It leverages Firebase Authentication, but has an improved ui and has more features.

experience.title: Master's Thesis project
text: A case study on how Managed Service Providers could benefit from Infrastructure as Code tools
• Implementing and analyzing Terraform module sharing strategies across projects and customers
• Best practices on how to to split existing Terraform code bases into reusable modules
• Interviewing Infrastructure as Code stakeholders for the company specifc insights

experience.title: Hackathon challenge winner
text: Challenge: Uniting empathy and gaming
Partner: Supercell
Real-time chat with advanced AI and user moderation

experience.title: Software Engineer
text: Creation of a new kind of real time remote control robotics platform
• Leading the development of robotics remote control library in Python
• Full Stack engineering with TypeScript, React and NodeJS
• Firmware development with C++ for robotics
• Onboarding, guiding and mentoring new team members

experience.title: Teaching Assistant, Python
text: Teaching assistant role for the advanced course in Python.

experience.title: Hackathon challenge winner
text: Track: AI & Big Data
Partner: Cisco
Web based data visualization of Cisco’s router network in Europe’s biggest Hackathon

experience.title: Trainee, R&D Laboratory
text: Research and testing of industrial valve designs. Automation of the processing of raw test data into reports.

experience.title: Master of Science (Technology)
text: • Major in Computer Science, study track: Big Data and Large Scale Computing
• Minor in Security and Cloud Computing

experience.title: Bachelor of Science (Technology)
text: • Major in Mechanical Engineering
• Minor in Computer Science
• Thesis involved streamlining and algorithmically optimizing industrial valve testing processes
